name: gouda
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hard, yellow cheese from the Netherlands with a mild (= not strong) flavour: I made two versions of the quiche, one with Gouda and the other with Gruyère. Most goudas can be kept for up to a year as long as they are still encased in wax. Remove the cauliflower from the oven, and layer with sliced Gouda cheese.
More examplesFewer examplesCalifornian producers make specialty cheeses such as Brie, Gouda, and blue. Some Goudas are so creamy that they almost taste like butter.
